About

I love life, liberty, and the fruits of the free market. There's no time to spend in meaningless careers. Projects and pursuits that I find intellectually and morally compelling command my full attention.

Work

Dash Network 2016-10-06 — future

https://github.com/dashcommunity
Hopeful Future Contributor

I'd like to offer my time and skills to the dash masternode operators and community. One day I hope the dash network will be financially capable of providing employment to thousands of people. That will require a collaborative commuity approach with strategic execution. I'd like to help build the tools necessary for that.

Highlights

  • Develop software and procedures aimed at expanding the dash workforce, leading to increased consumer demand
  • Offer philosophical and strategic guidance to the dash project
  • Support others by fostering positivity in community relations

SenseEnergy, LLC 2010-10-01 — 2016-01-01

Energy Efficiency Engineer - Principal/proprieter

Industrial energy efficiency consulting

Highlights

  • Managed company and projects from lead development/project scoping to verification of energy savings
  • Worked with utility companies and industrial customers to increase the efficiencyof electrical energy systems
  • Developed modeling techniques and tools to quantify energy consumption, savings for existing, proposed systems
  • Identified customers’ system inefficiencies and deficiencies and associated potential improvements
  • Installed temporary logging equipment to obtain data necessary for baseline and EEM analyses
  • Obtained vendor quotes for capital improvements; assess financial justificationof alternative solutions
  • Prepared and presented reports w/ project costs & savings, implementation steps, analysis methodologies, etc.
  • Commissioned systems for optimal performance using monitoring data and knowledge of best practices
  • Reviewed (QCed) Energy Analysis Reports (from other firms) for accuracy and appropriateness
